arts.ttl: Milan eyeing Lorenzo Lucca: Agent proposes striker to club
arts.sum: As the January transfer window approaches, Lorenzo Lucca has emerged as one of Serie A's standout performers, catching the attention of Italy's top clubs. The Udinese striker has been in impressive form, netting 7 goals in 18 league appearances and an additional 2 in the Coppa Italia. The post Milan eyeing Lorenzo Lucca: Agent proposes striker to club appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Udinese 2-2 Torino: Match Report
arts.sum: In a thrilling Serie A encounter, Torino fought back from a two-goal deficit to secure a 2-2 draw against Udinese, with Che Adams playing a pivotal role in the comeback. The match also marked the emotional return of Alexis Sanchez to Udinese after more than a decade. The post Serie A | Udinese 2-2 Torino: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Udinese v Torino: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: As Udinese prepare to host Torino, both teams are dealing with various injury concerns and lineup adjustments. Udinese manager Kosta Runjaic may receive a boost with the potential return of key defender Jaka Bijol, who missed the previous match against Fiorentina due to muscle fatigue. Additionally, midfielder Martin Payero has resumed training after a month-long absence. The post Serie A | Udinese v Torino: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

Udinese have won just one of their last seven Serie A games against Torino (D1 L5); in addition, after losing 0-2 in their last match on 16th March 2024, the Bianconeri could remain without scoring in two league matches in a row against the Granata for the first time since the period between December 2013 and October 2014 (three in that case). Udinese are the opponent that Antonio Sanabria has faced in the most matches without ever scoring in Serie A (eight games); both of his two goals in the current league season have been netted in away games (against Cagliari on 20th October and against Hellas Verona on 20th September).

arts.ttl: Serie A | Udinese v Torino: Match Preview
arts.sum: As the year draws to a close, Udinese and Torino prepare to face off in what promises to be an exciting encounter in Serie A on Sunday afternoon. Both teams, currently positioned in the mid-table, are eager to secure crucial points in their final match of 2024. The post Serie A | Udinese v Torino: Match Preview appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Milan’s January pursuit of Ricci: Tomori factor and Torino’s stance
arts.sum: AC Milan have identified Youssouf Fofana and Tijjani Reijnders as the cornerstones of their midfield, but depth remains a concern. The Rossoneri management is now considering a January reinforcement, with Samuele Ricci of Torino emerging as the top target for Giorgio Furlani, Zlatan Ibrahimovic, and Geoffrey Moncada. The post Milan’s January pursuit of Ricci: Tomori factor and Torino’s stance appeared first on FootItalia.com.
